org.seasar.portlet.util
クラス PortletResourceBundleUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.seasar.portlet.util.PortletResourceBundleUtil

public class PortletResourceBundleUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a utility class to use a resource bundle defined by portlet.xml on Seasar2 environment.

作成者:
Shinsuke Sugaya
